mapper.sql: id, card_num, amount, flow_type, descript, create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT into atm_flow(card_num, amount, flow_type, descript, create_time) value(#{cardNum}, #{amount}, #{flowType}, #{descript}, now());
mapper.select: select atm_flow.id, atm_flow.card_num, atm_flow.amount,flow_type, descript, atm_flow.create_time from atm_flow join atm_back_card on atm_flow.card_Num=atm_back_card.card_Num WHERE atm_back_card.OWNER_name=#{ownername} order by atm_flow.create_time desc LIMIT 10;
